topics.title: Personal Life Updates and Development Delays
topics.summary: Mick explains the lack of recent updates due to major life changes including moving, job change, engagement, and building horse facilities. He acknowledges funding challenges affecting Blitz development and credits the team members who have contributed to the project.

topics.title: Blitz TCG Current Development Status
topics.summary: Mick reports that Blitz remains a passion project with ongoing security updates and working integrations. Development continued until April with approximately half of the required abilities completed, and the game includes new animations, updated deck builder, and functional game boards.

topics.title: Future Plans and Community Appreciation
topics.summary: Mick expresses eagerness to resume development when market conditions improve and more time becomes available. He encourages community support for developers and emphasizes his commitment to the Ergo ecosystem while maintaining availability on Discord for questions and discussions.
